00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00042 template <class T> class matrix {
00043 private: vector<vector<T> > array;
00044 public:
00045         matrix(): array(0) {}
00046         matrix(int rows, int cols) : array(rows) {
00047                 for (int i = 0; i < rows; ++i)
00048                         array[i].resize(cols);
00049         }
00050         void resize(int rows, int cols) {
00051                 array.resize(rows);
00052                 for (int i=0; i < rows; ++i)
00053                         array[i].resize(cols);
00054         }
00055         matrix (int rows, int cols, T value) : array(rows) {
00056                 for (int i = 0; i < rows; ++i) {
00057                         array[i].resize(cols);
00058                         for (int j = 0; j < cols; ++j)
00059                                 array[i][j] = value;
00060                 }
00061         }
00062         const vector<T> & operator[](int row) const {
00063                 return array[row];}
00064         vector<T> & operator[](int row) {
00065                 return array[row];}
00066         int nRows() const {return array.size();}
00067         int nCols() const {return nRows() > 0 ? array[0].size() : 0;}
00068         double average() const {double sum = 0;
00069                 for (int i=0; i < nRows(); ++i) 
00070                         sum += mean(array[i]);
00071                 return sum / (double) nRows();
00072         }
00073         double average(const int minr, const int maxr,
00074                 const int minc, const int maxc) const {
00075                 if (minr <0 || minr > maxr || maxr >= nRows()) {
00076                         exit(1);
00077                 }
00078                 if (minc <0 || minc > maxc || maxc >= nCols()) {
00079                         exit(1);
00080                 }
00081                 double sum=0;
00082                 for (int i = minr; i <= maxr; ++i) {
00083                         double rowSum = 0;
00084                         for (int j = minc; j <= maxc; ++j) {
00085                                 rowSum += array[i][j];
00086                         }
00087                         sum += rowSum / (double) (maxc - minc + 1);
00088                 }
00089                 return sum / (double)(maxr - minr + 1);
00090         }
00091         const matrix<T> & operator=(const matrix<T> & rhs) {
00092                 if (this != &rhs) {
00093                         this->resize(rhs.nRows(), rhs.nCols());
00094                         for (int i = 0; i < rhs.nRows(); ++i) {
00095                                 for (int j = 0; j < rhs.nCols(); ++j) {
00096                                         (*this)[i][j] = rhs[i][j];
00097                                 }
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100                 return *this;
00101         }
00102 };

00104 struct ExpResults{
00105         double p_value;
00106         int call;
00107         ExpResults(): p_value(0), call(0) {}
00108         ExpResults(double p, int c): p_value(p), call(c) {}
00109         bool operator<(const struct ExpResults & rhs) const
00110         {return (p_value < rhs.p_value);}
00111         bool operator>(const struct ExpResults & rhs) const
00112         {return (p_value > rhs.p_value);}
00113 };
00114 
00115 struct FloatPair{
00116         float value1;
00117         float value2;
00118         FloatPair(): value1(0.0f), value2(0.0f) {}
00119         FloatPair(float v1, float v2): value1(v1), value2(v2) {}
00120         bool operator<(const struct FloatPair & rhs) const
00121         {return (value1 < rhs.value1);}
00122 };

00129         const double alpha1, const double alpha2);
